meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of stereophotography.
meanings.sent1: The stereophotographic camera captured images in 3D.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed stunning stereophotographic images of landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The stereophotographic device made the family photo look like a pop-up book!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a stereophotographic image, vivid and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was so lifelike, it seemed almost stereophotographic.

meanings.sent1: He kept a cherished stereophotographic of his grandparents on his desk.
meanings.sent2: The book included a fold-out stereophotographic of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The stereophotographic showed the group of friends frozen in a funny pose.
meanings.sent4: The old stereophotographic was a window to the past, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The stereophotographic from the concert captured the energy of the crowd perfectly.
